name: Customized Pastel Tumblr Customize Page
description: Has science gone too far? This simple tumblr customize page theme features a smaller scrollbar, and a more readable & pleasing pastel blue color palette. If you need something adjusted, customized, or have any other questions or concerns, feel free to contact me @eatyourheirs.
additional_info:
I might make this theme customizable, with color options etc. If anyone wants them.
